about.title: Who Am I?
about.content: Hello! I'm Süleyman Fatih, a passionate professional in technology and design. I love developing myself in different disciplines and I'm open to learning new things in every project. I have extensive experience in systems management, network design, and graphic design.

whatIDo.title: What Do I Do?
whatIDo.content: I work in systems management, network design, and graphic design. I'm passionate about web technologies, apply modern design principles, and always look for solutions to increase efficiency. I love bringing together user experience and technical excellence.

interests.title: My Interests
interests.content: Technology, design, photography, software development, and open source projects are my areas of interest. I love learning new things about Linux systems, cloud technologies, and UI/UX design. I value the combination of creativity and technical knowledge.

profile.title: Systems & Design Specialist
profile.career: 10+ years experience delivering systems administration and graphic design projects.

projects.name: Personal Blog Platform
projects.description: A dynamic blog platform I developed using HTML5, CSS3, and Vanilla JavaScript. Responsive design and easy-to-manage content system.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern and fully responsive website showcasing my work. Designed with SEO optimization and fast loading times.

projects.name: Technical Documentation Site
projects.description: A comprehensive knowledge base with detailed articles and guides about systems management and network design.
